title: Apple releases macOS 12.3 with Universal Control, new emoji, head tracking for Spatial Audio, more
content:
Following its “Peek performance” event and the launch of the new Mac Studio, Apple has released macOS 12.3. The new software for Mac includes the anticipated Universal Control, 40+ fresh emoji, new Siri voice, dynamic head tracking for Spatial Audio, and more.

more…

The post Apple releases macOS 12.3 with Universal Control, new emoji, head tracking for Spatial Audio, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has officially released macOS 12.3. The new software comes with Universal Control, 37 new emoji, and much more.
